mapper.select: select customer.username as customer_name, order_status.name as order_status, `order`.price, payment_method.name as payment_method, send_method.name as send_method, `order`.place_time, `order`.send_time, `order`.invoice_item, `order`.invoice_title from customer, `order`, order_status, payment_method, send_method where customer.username=#{userName} and customer.username=`order`.customer_id and `order`.status_id=order_status.id and payment_method.id=`order`.payment_method_id and send_method.id=`order`.send_method_id
